Kugarisana navamwe “Kana murume akanyengera musikana anenge ari mhandara asina kutsidzira kuti awanikwe uye akavata naye, iye anofanira kubvisa roora, uye achava mukadzi wake. Kana baba vake vasingadi zvachose kuti vamupe kwaari, anofanira bedzi kubvisa roora rinobvisirwa mhandara. “Usatendera muroyikadzi kuti ararame. “Ani naani anoita chipfuwo mukadzi anofanira kuurayiwa. “Ani naani anobayira kuna mwari upi zvake kunze kwangu anofanira kuparadzwa. “Usabata mutorwa zvakaipa kana kumudzvinyirira, nokuti imi makanga muri vatorwa muIjipiti. “Musaitira zvakaipa chirikadzi nenherera. Kana mukaita izvozvo uye ivo vakachema kwandiri, zvirokwazvo ndichanzwa kuchema kwavo. Kutsamwa kwangu kuchamuka, uye ndichakuurayai nomunondo; vakadzi venyu vachava chirikadzi uye vana venyu vachava nherera. “Kana mukakweretesa mari kuno mumwe wavanhu vangu vari pakati penyu vanoshaya, musaita somunhu webasa rokukweretesa; musamuripisa yava nemhindu. Kana ukatora jasi romuvakidzani wako sechitsidzo, uridzorere kwaari zuva rodoka, nokuti jasi rake ndicho chifukidzo bedzi chaanacho chomuviri wake. Achavata akafukeiko. Paanochema kwandiri, ini ndichanzwa, nokuti ndine tsitsi. “Usamhura Mwari kana kutuka mutongi wavanhu vako. “Usarega kupa zvipiriso zvinobva mumatura ako kana muzvisviniro zvako. “Unofanira kundipa dangwe ravanakomana vako. Muite zvimwe chetezvo kumombe dzenyu nokumakwai enyu. Murege zvigare mazuva manomwe navanamai vazvo, asi muzvipe kwandiri pazuva rorusere. “Munofanira kuva vanhu vangu vatsvene. Saka musadya nyama yechipfuwo chakabvamburwa nezvikara zvesango, muikandire kumbwa.

Mirayiro yoKururamisira neyoKunzwira Ngoni “Usaparadzira mashoko enhema. Usabatsira munhu akaipa nokuva chapupu chakaipa. “Usatevedzera vanhu vazhinji pakuita zvakaipa. Paunopa umboo mudare redzimhosva, usaminamisa kururamisira uchienda kurutivi rworuzhinji, uye usatsaura munhu murombo pamhaka yake. “Kana ukaona nzombe yomuvengi wako kana mbongoro yake yarasika, ona kuti waidzosera kwaari. Kana ukaona mbongoro yomunhu anokuvenga yawira pasi nokuda kwokuremerwa, usaisiya ipapo; iva nechokwadi kuti wamubatsira pairi. “Usaramba kururamisira varombo vavanhu vokwako pamatare edzimhosva. Usava nechokuita nokupomerwa kwemhosva yenhema uye usatongera rufu munhu asina mhosva, kana munhu akatendeka, nokuti ini handizopembedzi munhu ane mhosva. “Usagamuchira fufuro, nokuti fufuro inopofumadza vaya vanoona uye inomonyorora mashoko owakarurama. “Musadzvinyirira mutorwa; imi pachenyu munoziva kuti zvakaita sei kuva mutorwa, nokuti makanga muri vatorwa muIjipiti. Mirayiro yeSabata “Makore matanhatu munofanira kudyara minda yenyu mugokohwa zvirimwa, asi pagore rechinomwe nyika ngairege kurimwa kana kushandiswa. Ipapo varombo vari pakati pavanhu venyu vangawanawo zvokudya kubva mairi, uye zvikara zvesango zvigodya zvavanenge vasiya. Muitewo zvimwe chetezvo kuminda yenyu yemizambiringa neyemiorivhi. “Muite basa renyu mazuva matanhatu, asi pazuva rechinomwe musashanda, kuitira kuti nzombe yako nembongoro yako zvizorore uye nhapwa yakaberekerwa mumba mako, nomutorwa, vazororewo. “Muchenjerere kuti muite zvose zvandakareva kwamuri. Musareva mazita avamwe vamwari; ngaarege kunzwikwa pamiromo yenyu. Mitambo Mitatu yeGore “Katatu pagore munofanira kepemberera mutambo kwandiri. “Mupemberere Mutambo weChingwa Chisina Mbiriso; mazuva manomwe, munofanira kudya chingwa chisina mbiriso, sezvandakakurayirai. Muite izvi panguva dzakatarwa mumwedzi waAbhibhi, nokuti mumwedzi iwoyo ndipo pamakabuda kubva muIjipiti. “Hakuna munhu anofanira kumira pamberi pangu asina chinhu. “Mupemberere Mutambo woKukohwa nezvibereko zvokutanga zvezvirimwa zvamakadyara muminda yenyu. “Mupemberere Mutambo woKuunganidza pakupera kwegore, pamunounganidza zvirimwa zvenyu kubva mumunda. “Vamwe vose vanofanira kumira pamberi paIshe Jehovha katatu pagore. “Musapa ropa rechibayiro kwandiri pamwe chete nechinhu chipi zvacho chine mbiriso. “Mafuta ezvipiriso zvangu zvomutambo haafaniri kuchengetwa kusvikira mangwana mangwanani. “Muuye nezvakanakisisa zvezvibereko zvokutanga zvevhu renyu kuimba yaJehovha Mwari wenyu. “Musabika mbudzana mumukaka wamai vayo. Mutumwa waMwari achagadzira nzira “Tarirai, ndiri kutumira mutumwa pamberi penyu kuti akuchengetei munzira uye kuti akusvitsei kunzvimbo yandakakugadzirirai. Murerekere nzeve dzenyu kwaari mugoteerera zvaanoreva. Musamumukira; iye haangazoregereri kumukira kwenyu, sezvo Zita rangu riri maari. Kana mukanyatsoteerera kune zvaanoreva nokuita zvose zvandinoreva, ini ndichava muvengi kuvavengi venyu uye ndichapikisa avo vanokupikisai. Mutumwa wangu achakutungamirirai uye agokupinzai munyika yavaAmori, vaHiti, vaPerezi, vaKenani, vaHivhi navaJebhusi, uye ndichavapedza chose. Musapfugamira vamwari vavo kana kuvanamata kana kuwadzana namabasa avo. Munofanira kuvaparadza uye mugoputsa matombo avo anoyera. Namatai Jehovha Mwari wenyu, uye maropafadzo ake achava pane zvokudya zvenyu nemvura yenyu. Ndichabvisa urwere kubva pakati penyu, uye hakuna achabva pamuviri kana asingabereki munyika yenyu. Ndichakupai upenyu huzere. “Ndichatuma kuvhundutsa kwangu pamberi penyu uye ndichauyisa nyonganiso pamusoro pendudzi dzose dzamunosangana nadzo. Ndichaita kuti vavengi venyu vose vatendeuke. Vagotiza. Ndichatuma mago pamberi penyu kuti adzinge vaHivhi, vaKenani navaHiti kuti vabve munzira yenyu. Asi handizovadzingi mugore rimwe chete, nokuti nyika ingazoita sango uye mhuka dzesango dzikakuwandirai. Ndichavabvisa pamberi penyu zvishoma zvishoma, kusvikira manyatsowanda kuti mutore nyika. “Ndichasimbisa miganhu yenyu kubva kuGungwa Dzvuku kusvikira kuGungwa ravaFiristia, uye kubva kuRenje kusvikira kuRwizi. Ndichaisa mumaoko enyu vanhu vagere munyika iyi uye imi muchavadzinga pamberi penyu. Musaita sungano navo kana navamwari vavo. Musavatendera kuti vagare munyika yenyu kuti varege kukuitai kuti munditadzire, nokuti kunamata vamwari vavo kuchava musungo kwamuri zvirokwazvo.”

Sungano inosimbiswa Ipapo Iye akati kuna Mozisi, “Kwira kuna Jehovha, iwe naAroni, Nadhabhu naAbhihu, navakuru vavaIsraeri makumi manomwe. Munamate muri chinhambwe, asi Mozisi oga ndiye anofanira kuswedera kuna Jehovha; vamwe havafaniri kuswedera pedyo. Uye vanhu havangakwiri naye.” Mozisi akati aenda kundoudza vanhu mashoko ose nemirayiro yose yaJehovha, ivo vakati nenzwi rimwe chete, “Tichaita zvinhu zvose zvakarehwa naJehovha.” Ipapo Mozisi akanyora zvinhu zvose zvakanga zvarehwa naJehovha. Akamuka mangwana acho mangwanani akavaka aritari mujinga megomo uye akamisa mbiru dzamabwe gumi nembiri dzichimirira marudzi gumi namaviri avaIsraeri. Ipapo akatuma majaya avaIsraeri, uye vakapa zvipiriso zvinopiswa uye vakabayira hando duku sezvipiriso zvokuwadzana kuna Jehovha. Mozisi akatora hafu yeropa akariisa mumidziyo, uye imwe hafu akaisasa paaritari. Ipapo akatora Bhuku reSungano akariverengera vanhu. Ivo vakati, “Tichaita zvinhu zvose zvakarehwa naJehovha; tichazviteerera.” Ipapo Mozisi akatora ropa, akarisasa pamusoro pavanhu uye akati, “Iri iropa resungano yaitwa naJehovha nemi maererano namashoko aya ose.” Mozisi naAroni, Nadhabhu naAbhihu uye navakuru makumi manomwe vavaIsraeri vakakwira uye vakaona Mwari waIsraeri. Pasi petsoka dzake pakanga pane chimwe chinhu chakaita sechivakwa chesafiri, chakanga chichionekwa sedenga pacharo. Asi Mwari haana kusimudza ruoko rwake pamusoro pavatungamiri vavaIsraeri ava; vakaona Mwari, uye vakadya vakanwa. Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Kwira kuno kwandiri pamusoro pegomo uye ugare pano, uye ndichakupa mahwendefa amabwe, ane mirayiro nemitemo zvandanyora kuti varayirwe.” Ipapo Mozisi akasimuka naJoshua mubatsiri wake, uye Mozisi akakwira mugomo raMwari. Akati kuvakuru, “Timirirei pano kusvikira tadzoka kwamuri. Aroni naHuri vanemi, uye ani naani zvake anopesana nomumwe anogona kuenda kwavari.” Mozisi akati akwira mugomo, gore rakarifukidza, uye kubwinya kwaJehovha kwakagara pamusoro peGomo reSinai. Gore rakafukidza gomo iro kwamazuva matanhatu, uye pazuva rechinomwe, Jehovha akadana Mozisi ari mukati megore. KuvaIsraeri, kubwinya kwaJehovha kwaitaridzika somoto unoparadza uri pamusoro pegomo. Ipapo akapinda mugore paakanga achikwira mugomo. Uye akagara mugomo kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku huna makumi mana.

Zvipiriso zveTabhenakeri Uye Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Taurira vaIsraeri kuti vandivigire chipiriso. Unofanira kugamuchira chipiriso changu kubva kumunhu upi noupi anosundwa nomwoyo wake kuti ape. Izvi ndizvo zvipiriso zvaunofanira kugamuchira kubva kwavari: goridhe, sirivha, ndarira; wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nemicheka yakaisvonaka; makushe embudzi; matehwe amakondohwe akapendwa zvitsvuku namatehwe emombe dzomugungwa; matanda omuakasia; mafuta omuorivhi emwenje; zvinonhuwira zvemafuta okuzodza anonhuwira uye nezvimwe zvinonhuwira; mabwe eonikisi nezvimwe zvinokosha zvinofanira kuiswa paefodhi napachidzitiro chechipfuva. “Ipapo uite kuti vaite nzvimbo yangu tsvene, uye ini ndichagara pakati pavo. Muite tabhenakeri iyi nemidziyo yayo yose nomufananidzo wandichakuratidza. Areka “Uite kuti vaite bhokisi ramatanda omuakasia, rakareba makubhiti maviri nehafua, upamhi kubhiti nehafub, uye kubhiti nehafu pakukwira. Murifukidze negoridhe rakaisvonaka, mukati nokunze, uye muite hata yegoridhe yakaripoteredza. Muiumbire mhete dzegoridhe mugodzisungira pamakumbo aro mana, nemhete mbiri pano rumwe rutivi uye mhete mbiri kuno rumwe rutivi. Ipapo mugoita matanda omuakasia uye negoridhe. Muise matanda aya mukati memhete dziri parutivi rwebhokisi kuti mutakure bhokisi nawo. Matanda anofanira kugara ari mumhete dzebhokisi iri; haafaniri kubviswa. Ipapo mugoisa muareka chipupuriro, chandichakupai. “Muite chifunhiro chokuyananisa chegoridhe rakaisvonaka, makubhiti maviri nehafuc pakureba uye kubhiti nehafud paupamhi. Uye muite makerubhi maviri egoridhe rakapambadzirwa kumacheto echifunhiro. Muite kerubhi rimwe chete kuno rumwe rutivi uye kerubhi rechipiri kuno rumwe rutivi; muite bandi rimwe chete rekerubhi nechifukidzo, pamativi maviri. Mapapiro amakerubhi anofanira kutambanudzirwa kumusoro, akafukidzira chifunhiro. Makerubhi anofanira kutarisana, akatarira kuchifunhiro. Muise chifunhiro pamusoro peareka uye mugoisa muareka, Chipupuriro chandichakupai. Ipapo, pamusoro pechifunhiro chiri pakati pamakerubhi maviri ari pamusoro peareka yeChipupuriro, ndichasangana newe ndigokupa mirayiro yangu yose yavaIsraeri. Tafura “Uite tafura namatanda omuakasia yakareba makubhiti mavirie, kubhiti rimwe chetef paupamhi uye kubhiti nehafug pakukwirira. Muifukidzire negoridhe rakaisvonaka uye mugoipoteredza nezvakaumbwa zvegoridhe. Uyewo uite vhiri rinoipoteredza rino upamhi hwakaita sechanza choruokoh ugoisa goridhe rakaumbwa pamusoro pevhiri. Uite mhete ina dzegoridhe dzetafura ugodzisungira kumakona mana, pane makumbo ayo. Mhete idzi dzinofanira kuva pedyo nevhiri kuti dzibate matanda anoshandiswa kutakura tafura. Uite matanda omuakasia, uafukidze negoridhe uye mugotakura tafura nawo. Uye uite ndiro dzayo namadhishi negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uyewo namatende ayo nembiya dzokudirisa zvipiriso. Uise chingwa choKuvapo patafura iyi kuti chive pamberi pangu nguva dzose. Chigadziko choMwenje “Uite chigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rakaisvonaka uye ugoipambadzira pasi payo pamwe chete nerwiriko rwayo; mbiya dzayo, mabukira namaruva acho zvichava chinhu chimwe chete nacho. Matavi matanhatu anofanira kutambarara achibva mumativi echigadziko chomwenje, matatu kuno rumwe rutivi uye matatu kuno rumwezve. Mikombe mitatu yakaumbwa samaruva omuarimondi namabukira uye namaruva zvinofanira kuva padavi rimwe chete, matatu kune rimwe davi, uye zvimwe chetezvo kumativi matanhatu ose anotambarara kubva pachigadziko chomwenje. Uye pachigadziko chomwenje panofanira kuva nemikombe mina yakaumbwa samaruva omuarimondi ane mabukira namaruva. Bukira rimwe chete richava pasi pamatavi maviri okutanga anotambarara kubva pachigadziko chomwenje, bukira rechipiri riri pasi pamamwe matavi maviri, uye bukira rechitatu riri pasi pamamwezve pamatavi maviri, mativi ose ari matanhatu. Mabukira namatavi achava ebandi rimwe chete nechigadziko chomwenje, negoridhe rakaisvonaka rakapambadzirwa. “Ipapo ugoita mwenje yacho minomwe uye ugoigadzika pamusoro pacho kuitira kuti zvigovhenekera nzvimbo iri mberi kwacho. Mbato dzacho nendiro dzacho zvinofanira kuva zvegoridhe rakaisvonaka. Tarendai regoridhe rakaisvonaka rinofanira kushandiswa pachigadziko chomwenje nemimwe midziyo yose iyi. Uone kuti wazviita zvichienderana nomufananidzo wawakaratidzwa pagomo.

Tabhenakeri “Uite tabhenakeri namachira gumi omucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka, nowebhuruu, pepuru nomutsvuku, namakerubhi akasonerwa mairi nemhizha dzamabasa amaoko. Machira ose anofanira kuva akaenzana, akareba makubhiti makumi maviri namaserea uye makubiti manab paupamhi. Ubatanidze machira mashanu pamwe chete, ugoita zvimwe chetezvo namamwe mashanu. Uite zvishwe zvomucheka webhuruu kurutivi rwokumucheto wejira zvakabatanidzwa pamwe chete, uye ugoita zvimwe chete nejira rokumucheto mune zvimwe zvakabatanidzwa. Uite zvishwe makumi mashanu pajira rimwe chete uye makumi mashanu ezvishwe pamucheto wejira rezvimwe zvakabatanidzwa, zvishwe zvitarisane chimwe nechimwe. Ipapo ugoita zvikoreko zvegoridhe makumi mashanu uye uzvishandise kubatanidza machira pamwe chete kuitira kuti tabhenakeri ive chinhu chimwe. “Uite machira amakushe embudzi etende riri pamusoro petabhenakeri, ose ave gumi nerimwe pamwe chete. Machira ose ari gumi nerimwe anofanira kuenzana, makubhiti makumi matatuc pakureba uye makubhiti manad paupamhi. Ubatanidze machira mashanu pamwe chete aite chinhu chimwe chete uye mamwe matanhatu avewo chinhu chimwe chete. Upete jira rechitanhatu kaviri pamberi petende. Uite zvishwe makumi mashanu pamupendero wejira rokumucheto zvakabatanidzwa uyewo pamupendero wejira rokumucheto kwamamwe akabatanidzwa. Ipapo ugoita zvikorekedzo zvendarira makumi mashanu ugozviisa muzvishwe kuti zvibatanidze tende pamwe chete chigova chinhu chimwe chete. Kana zviri zvokuwedzera urefu hwamachira etende, hafu yejira inenge yasara inofanira kurembera necheshure kwetabhenakeri. Machira etende anofanira kurebesa nekubhiti rimwe chetee pamativi ose ari maviri; anenge asara anofanira kurembera pamativi etabhenakeri kuti agoifukidza. Uite chifukidzo chetende chamatehwe amakondohwe akapendwa nezvitsvuku, uye pamusoro paizvozvo chifukidzo chamatehwe emombe dzomugungwa. “Uitire tabhenakeri mapuranga akati twi amatanda omuakasia. Puranga rimwe nerimwe rinofanira kureba makubhiti gumif uye kubhiti nehafug paupamhi, nembamba mbiri dzakamiswa dzakatarisana. Uite mapuranga ose etabhenakeri nenzira iyoyi. Uite mapuranga makumi maviri okurutivi rwezasi rwetabhenakeri uye uite zvigadzika zvesirivha makumi mana kuti zvive pasi pawo, zvigadziko zviviri papuranga rimwe nerimwe, chimwe chete pasi pembambo imwe neimwe. Kuno rumwe rutivi, rwokumusoro kwetabhenakeri, uite mapuranga makumi maviri, uye zvigadziko zvesirivha makumi mana. Zviviri zviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. Uite mapuranga matanhatu kurutivi rwokumucheto cheto, ndiko kumavirira etabhenakeri, uye uite mapuranga maviri amakona okumucheto cheto. Pamakona maviri aya, anofanira kuva maviri maviri kubva pasi kusvikira kumusoro, uye agadzikwe mumhete imwe chete; ose ari maviri ngaava saizvozvo. Saka pachava namapuranga masere uye zvigadziko zvesirivha gumi nezvitanhatu, zviviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. “Uyewo uite mbariro dzamatanda omuakasia: shanu dzamapuranga okuno rumwe rutivi rwetabhenakeri, shanu dzaaya ari pano rumwe rutivi, uye shanu dzamapuranga okumavirira, kumucheto cheto kwetabhenakeri. Mbariro yapakati inofanira kutandavara kubva kumucheto kusvikira kuno mumwe mucheto napakati pamapuranga. Ufukidze mapuranga negoridhe uye ugoita mhete dzegoridhe kuti dzigobata mbariro. Uyewo ufukidze mbariro negoridhe. “Umise tabhenakeri maererano nomufananidzo wawakaratidzwa mugomo. “Uite jira rebhuruu, nerepepuru nedzvuku nomucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa, namakerubhi akasonerwapo nemhizha yokusona. Urirembedze nezvikorekedzo zvegoridhe pamatanda mana omuakasia akafukidzwa negoridhe uye amire pamusoro pezvigadziko zvina zvesirivha. Urembedze jira pazvikorekedzo uye ugoisa areka yeChipupuriro shure kwechidzitiro. Chidzitiro ichi chichaparadzanisa NZVIMBO TSVENE neNZVIMBO TSVENE-TSVENE. Uise chifukidziro chokuyananisa pamusoro peareka yeChipupuriro iri muNZVIMBO TSVENE-TSVENE. Uise tafura kunze kwechidzitiro nechokumusoro kwetabhenakeri ugogadzika chigadziko chomwenje chakatarisana nayo nechezasi. “Pamukova wokupinda mutende uite chidzitiro chewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa, basa romusoni anogona. Uite zvikorekedzo zvegoridhe zvechidzitiro ichi uye matanda mashanu omuakasia akafukidzwa negoridhe. Uye uaumbire zvigadziko zvishanu zvendarira.

Aritari yeZvipiriso Zvinopiswa “Uvake aritari yamatanda omuakasia, makubhiti matatua pakukwirira kwayo; inofanira kuva namativi mana akaenzana, kureba kwayo makubhiti mashanub uye upamhi hwayo makubhiti mashanu. Uite runyanga pamakona ayo mana, kuti nyanga nearitari zvive chinhu chimwe, uye ufukidze aritari nendarira. Uite midziyo yayo yose nendarira, hari dzayo kuti dzibvise madota, uye foshoro dzayo, mbiya dzokusasa nadzo, zvibayiso zvenyama uye makango apamoto. Uyiitire chiparo, mumbure, ndarira, uye ugoita mhete yendarira pakona imwe neimwe yomumbure. Uchiise pasi pechitsiko chearitari kuitira kuti chive pakati nepakati pearitari. Uitire aritari matanda omuakasia uye ugoafukidza nendarira. Matanda aya anofanira kupinzwa mukati memhete kuti agova kumativi maviri earitari painenge yotakurwa. Uite aritari namapuranga, isina chinhu mukati mayo. Inofanira kugadzirwa sokuratidzwa kwawakaitwa pagomo. Ruvazhe “Uitire tabhenakeri ruvazhe. Rutivi rwezasi runofanira kureba makubhiti zanac uye runofanira kuva namachira akarembedzwa omucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka, namatanda makumi maviri uye zvigadziko zvendarira makumi maviri uye zvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamatanda. Rutivi rwokumusoro rucharebawo makubhiti zana uye runofanira kuva namachira akarembedzwa, namatanda makumi maviri, nezvigadziko zvendarira makumi maviri, uye zvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamatanda. “Kumucheto kworuvazhe, nechokumavirira, kunofanira kuva noupamhi hwamakubhiti makumi mashanud uye machira akarembedzwa, namatanda gumi uye zvigadziko gumi. Kumucheto nechokumabvazuva kwakatarisana nokunobuda nezuva, upamhi hworuvazhe hunofanira kuva makubhiti makumi mashanu. Machira akareba makubhiti gumi namashanue anofanira kuva kuno rumwe rutivi rwomukova, namatanda matatu nezvigadziko zvitatu, uye mamwe machira akareba makubhiti gumi namashanu ngaavewo kuno rumwe rutivi, namatanda matatu nezvigadziko zvitatuwo. “Pamukova wokupinda muruvazhe, uise chidzitiro chakareba makubhiti makumi mavirif, chewuru yebhuruu, yepepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa, basa romusoni anogona, namatanda mana uyewo zvigadziko zvina. Matanda ose akapoteredza ruvazhe anofanira kuva nezvisungiso zvesirivha nezvikorekedzo, uye zvigadziko zvendarira. Ruvazhe ruchareba makubhiti zanag uye makubhiti makumi mashanuh paupamhi, namachira emicheka yakarukwa yakaisvonaka yakareba makubhiti mashanui, uye nezvigadziko zvendarira. Mimwe midziyo inoshandiswa paushumiri hwetabhenakeri, ringava basa ripi zvaro, kusanganisira mbambo dzose dzetende neiya yomuruvazhe, inofanira kuva yendarira. Mafuta eChigadziko choMwenje “Urayire vaIsraeri kuti vakuvigire mafuta omuorivhi akachena, akasvinwa omwenje, kuitira kuti mwenje irambe ichipfuta. MuTende Rokusangana, kunze kwechidzitiro chiri pamberi peChipupuriro, Aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kurega mwenje ichiramba ichipfuta pamberi paJehovha, kubva madekwana kusvikira mangwanani. Uyu unofanira kuva mutemo usingaperi pakati pavaIsraeri nokumarudzi anotevera.

Nguo dzoUprista “Uite kuti Aroni mukoma wako pamwe chete navanakomana vake vanoti Nadhabhu naAbhihu, Ereazari naItamari vauyiswe kwandiri kubva pakati pavaIsraeri kuti vandishumire savaprista. Uitire mukoma wako nguo tsvene, kuti apiwe ruremekedzo uye kukudzwa. Utaurire varume voumhizha vose vandakapa uchenjeri hwokuita zvakadaro kuti vanofanira kusonera Aroni nguo, dzokutsaurwa kwake, kuti agondishumira somuprista. Idzi ndidzo nguo dzavanofanira kuita: chidzitiro chapa chipfuva, efodhi, jasi, nenguo yakarukwa, nengowani uye ndaza. Vanofanira kuitira mukoma wako Aroni navanakomana vake, nguo tsvene idzi. Uvaite kuti vashandise wuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye mucheka wakaisvonaka. Efodhi “Vaite efodhi yewuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, nomucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa, basa romunhu ano umhizha. Ngaive namapenga maviri apamapfudzi akabatanidzwa pamakona ayo maviri, kuitira kuti igogona kubatanidzwa. Bhanire rayo rakarukwa noumhizha rinofanira kufanana nayo, rive rebenga rimwe chete neefodhi uye rakagadzirwa newuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa. “Utore mabwe maviri eonikisi ugonyora runyoro rwakatemwa pamusoro pawo mazita avanakomana vaIsraeri zvichienderana nokuberekwa kwavo, mazita matanhatu padombo rimwe chete uye mamwe matanhatu asara anyorwe pane rimwe dombo. Nyora mazita avanakomana vaIsraeri pamatombo maviri nenzira inoitwa nomuvezi wamatombo achitema runyoro pachisimbiso. Ipapo ugoamisa muzvirukwa zvegoridhe uye ugoasungirira pamapenga apapfudzi eefodhi ave matombo echirangaridzo kuvana vaIsraeri. Aroni anofanira kutakura mazita aya pamapfudzi ake chive chirangaridzo pamberi paJehovha. Uite zvirukwa zvegoridhe uye ngeketani mbiri dzakarukwa setambo negoridhe rakaisvonaka, ugobatanidza ngeketani nezvirukwa. Chidzitiro chapaChipfuva “Uite chidzitiro chapachipfuva chokutanga, basa romunhu woumhizha. Uchiite chifanane neefodhi yewuru yegoridhe, nebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye mucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa. Ngachienzane mativi ose ari mana, kureba kwacho sechanza choruokoa uye upamhi hwakaita sechanza choruoko, uye chipetwe kaviri. Ipapo uronge mitsara mina yamatombo anokosha pamusoro pacho. Mumutsara wokutanga muchava nerubhi, netopazi uye bheriri; mumutsara wechipiri muchava neturikoisi, safire neemaradhi; mumutsara wechitatu muchava nejasindi, agati uye ameneametisiti; mumutsara wechina muchava nekirisoriti, onekisi uye nejasipa. Uaise muzvirukwa zvegoridhe. Panofanira kuva namatombo gumi namaviri, rimwe chete richimirira zita rimwe nerimwe ravanakomana vaIsraeri, rimwe nerimwe rakatemwa runyoro padombo sezvinoita chisimbiso chezita romumwe wavamarudzi gumi namaviri. “Uite ngetani dzechidzitiro chapachipfuva dzakarukwa negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uzvimone setambo. Uite mhete mbiri dzegoridhe ugodzisungirira pamakona maviri echidzitiro chapachipfuva. Usungirire ngetani mbiri dzegoridhe pamhete dziri pamakona echidzitiro chapachipfuva, nemimwe micheto yengetani inoenda kuzvirukwa zviviri uchizvibatanidza, kuzvipenga zvapamapfudzi zveefodhi nechokumberi. Uite mhete mbiri dzegoridhe ugodzibatanidza kuna mamwe makona echidzitiro chapachipfuva pamupendero wechomukati kunotevererana neefodhi. Uitezve dzimwe mhete dzegoridhe ugodzibatanidza pasi pemapenga apamapfudzi nechokumberi kweefodhi, pedyo nomusono uri nechapamusoro pebhanire romuchiuno reefodhi. Mhete dzepachidzitiro chechipfuva dzinofanira kusungirirwa pamhete dzeefodhi netambo yebhuruu, dzichibatanidzwa nebhanire romuchiuno, kuitira kuti chidzitiro chapachipfuva chirege kubva paefodhi. “Nguva dzose Aroni paanenge achipinda muNzvimbo Tsvene, achange akatakura mazita avanakomana vaIsraeri pamwoyo wake pachidzitiro chechipfuva chokutanga sechirangaridzo chenguva dzose pamberi paJehovha. Uyezve uise Urimi neTumimi muchidzitiro chechipfuva, kuitira kuti vagare vari pamwoyo waAroni pose paanenge achipinda pamberi paJehovha. Nokudaro Aroni acharamba akatakura zvinhu zvokutonga nazvo vaIsraeri pamwoyo wake pamberi paJehovha. Dzimwe Nguo dzoUprista “Uite jasi rose zvaro reefodhi nomucheka webhuruu, neburi romusoro pakati paro. Panofanira kuzova nomupendero wakarukwa wakaita sekora unopoteredza buri iri, kuitira kuti rirege kubvaruka. Uite matambo ewuru yebhuruu, yepepuru netsvuku akapoteredza mupendero wejasi, namatare egoridhe pakati pawo. Matare egoridhe namatamba zvinofanira kukayana zvichipoteredza mupendero wejasi. Aroni anofanira kuripfeka paanenge achishumira. Kurira kwamatare kuchanzwikwa paanenge achipinda muNzvimbo Tsvene pamberi paJehovha uye nepaanenge achibuda, kuitira kuti arege kufa. “Uite ndiro yegoridhe ugotema runyoro pairi sezvinoitwa pachisimbiso kuti: MUTSVENE KUNA JEHOVHA. Usungire tambo yebhuruu pairi kuti ibatanidzwe nenguwani; inofanira kuva mberi kwenguwani. Ichava pahuma yaAroni, uye iye achatakura mhosva dzingava pazvipo zvitsvene zvinotsaurwa navaIsraeri, zvingava zvipo zvipi hazvo. Zvichava pahuma yaAroni nguva dzose kuitira kuti zvigamuchirwe naJehovha. “Uruke jasi romucheka wakaisvonaka ugoita nguwani yomucheka wakaisvonaka. Ndaza inofanira kuva basa romuruki. Uite majasi, ndaza namabhanire omumusoro avanakomana vaAroni, kuti vapiwe ruremekedzo nokukudzwa. Shure kwokunge wapfekedza mukoma wako Aroni navanakomana vake, uvazodze uye ugovagadza. Uvatsaure kuti vagondishumira savaprista. “Uite nguo dzapasi dzomucheka dzive chifukidzo chomuviri, dzinobva muchiuno kusvikira kumabvi. Aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kudzipfeka pose pavanenge vachipinda muTende roKusangana kana kuswedera paaritari kuti vashumire vari muNzvimbo Tsvene, kuitira kuti varege kuva nemhosva vakafa.

Kunatswa kwaVaprista “Izvi ndizvo zvaunofanira kuita kuti uvanatse, kuti vandishumire savaprista: Utore hando duku namakondohwe maviri asina chaanopomerwa. Uye ubike chingwa noupfu hwakatsetseka hwegorosi, husina mbiriso, uye ubike makeke akavhenganiswa namafuta, nezvingwa zvitete zvakazorwa mafuta. Uzviise mudengu uye ugozvikumikidza zviri imomo, pamwe chete nehando uye makondohwe maviri. Ipapo ugouya naAroni navanakomana vake kumukova nokupinda navo kuTende Rokusangana ugovashambidza nemvura. Tora hanzu ugopfekedza Aroni jasi, nguo yeefodhi neefodhi pachayo uye nechidzitiro chapachipfuva. Usungire efodhi paari nebhanire romuchiuno rakarukwa nounyanzvi. Uise nguwani pamusoro wake uye ugoibatanidza nekorona tsvene. Utore mafuta okuzodza ugomuzodza uchiita zvokuadira pamusoro pake. Uye vanakomana vake ugovapfekedza majasi uye ugoisa mabhanire omumusoro pamusoro pavo. Ipapo ugosungira ndaza pana Aroni navanakomana vake. Uprista ndohwavo nomutemo usingaperi. Nenzira iyi uchagadza Aroni navanakomana vake. “Uuye nehando pamberi peTende Rokusangana, uye Aroni navanakomana vake vachaisa maoko avo pamusoro payo. Uiuraye pamberi pomukova wokupinda kuTende Rokusangana. Utore rimwe reropa rehando ugoriisa panyanga dzearitari nomunwe wako, uye ugodira rasara racho pahwaro hwearitari. Ipapo ugotora mafuta ose akapoteredza zvomukati, zvinoti chiropa, neitsvo dziri mbiri namafuta ari pamusoro padzo, ugoapisa pamusoro pearitari. Asi upise nyama yehando nedehwe rayo namazvizvi ayo kunze kwomusasa. Ndicho chipiriso chechivi. “Utore rimwe regondohwe, uye Aroni navanakomana vake vagoisa maoko avo pamusoro paro. Uriuraye ugotora ropa raro urisase pamativi ose earitari. Ucheke gondohwe kuita muzvidimbu zvidimbu uye ugosuka zvomukati, uye makumbo, uchiaisa pamwe chete nomusoro nezvimwe zvidimbu. Ipapo ugopisa gondohwe rose paaritari. Ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa kuna Jehovha, chinonhuwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chinoitirwa Jehovha nomoto. “Utore rimwe gondohwe, uye Aroni navanakomana vake vachaisa maoko avo pamusoro waro. Uriuraye, utore rimwe ropa raro ugoriisa pamucheto wenzeve dzorudyi dzavanakomana vaAroni, napazvigunwe zvikuru zvamaoko avo orudyi, nokuzvigunwe zvikuru zvokutsoka dzavo dzorudyi. Ipapo ugosasa ropa pamativi ose earitari. Uye ugotora rimwe ropa riri paaritari namamwe mafuta okuzodza usase pana Aroni napanguo dzake uye napavanakomana vake napanguo dzavo. Ipapo iye navanakomana vake nenguo dzavo vachanatswa. “Utore pagondohwe iri mafuta, mafuta apamuswe, mafuta akapoteredza zvomukati, akafukidza chiropa, itsvo dzose dziri mbiri namafuta ari padziri, uye nechidya chokurudyi. (Iri ndiro gondohwe rokugadzwa.) Kubva padengu rechingwa chakabikwa chisina mbiriso, chiri pamberi paJehovha, utore chimwe chete, nekeke rakavhenganiswa namafuta, uye nechingwa chitete. Uise izvi zvose mumaoko aAroni navanakomana vake ugozvininira pamberi paJehovha sechipiriso chokuninira. Ipapo uzvitore kubva mumaoko avo ugozvipisa paaritari pamwe chete nechipiriso chinopiswa chinonhuwira zvinofadza kuna Jehovha, chipiriso chinoitirwa Jehovha nomoto. Shure kwokunge watora chityu chegondohwe rokugadzwa kwaAroni, uchininire pamberi paJehovha sechipiriso chokuninira uye chichava mugove wako. “Unatse mitezo iyo yegondohwe rokugadza raAroni navanakomana vake: chityu chakaninirwa uye chakakumikidzwa. Uyu unofanira kuva mugove wenguva dzose unobva kuvaIsraeri, waAroni navanakomana vake. Uyu ndiwo mugove unofanira kupiwa navaIsraeri kuna Jehovha kubva pazvipiriso zvavo zvokuwadzana. “Nguo tsvene dzaAroni dzichava dzezvizvarwa zvake kuitira kuti vazodzwe uye vagogadzwa vakadzipfeka. Mwanakomana wake achamutevera pauprista uye anouya kuTende Rokusangana kuti azoshumira ari muNzvimbo Tsvene, anofanira kudzipfeka kwamazuva manomwe. “Utore gondohwe rokugadzwa ugobika nyama yaro munzvimbo tsvene. Aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kudya nyama yegondohwe uye nechingwa chiri mudengu vari pamukova wokupinda paTende Rokusangana. Vanofanira kudya zvipiriso izvi zvavakaitirwa yananiso yokugadzwa kwavo uye nokunatswa kwavo nazvo. Asi hakuna mumwe munhu anofanira kuzvidya nokuti zvitsvene. Uye kana pakava nenyama yegondohwe rokungadzwa inosara kana chingwa chipi zvacho chinosara kusvikira mangwana mangwanani muzvipise. Hazvifaniri kudyiwa, nokuti zvitsvene. “Uitire Aroni navanakomana vake zvinhu zvose zvandakakurayira, uchitora mazuva manomwe okuvagadza. Ubayire hando zuva rimwe nerimwe sechipiriso chechivi chive chokuyananisa. Unatse aritari nokuiitira yananiso, uye ugoizodza kuti uiite tsvene. Mazuva manomwe uyananisire aritari uye uinatse. Ipapo aritari ichava tsvene-tsvene, uye chose chichaigunzva chichava chitsvene. “Izvi ndizvo zvaunofanira kupa paaritari nguva dzose zuva rimwe nerimwe: makwayana maviri egore rimwe chete. Ubayire rimwe chete mangwanani uye rimwe chete madekwana. Negwayana rokutanga ubayire nechegumi cheefaa choupfu hwakatsetseka hwakasanganiswa nechikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvina chehinib chamafuta akabva mumaorivhi akasvinwa, uye chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvina chehini yewaini chive chipiriso chinonwiwa. Ubayire rimwe gwayana madekwana pamwe chete nechipiriso chimwe chetecho chezviyo nechipiriso chacho chinonwiwa sechamangwanani, chive chinonhuwira zvinofadza, chipiriso chakaitirwa Jehovha nomoto. “Chipiriso chinopiswa ichi chinofanira kuitwa nguva dzose pamukova weTende Rokusangana pamberi paJehovha kumarudzi ose. Ipapo ndipo pandichasangana newe uye ndigotaura kwauri, ndipozve pandichasangana navaIsraeri, uye nzvimbo iyi ichatsaurwa nokubwinya kwangu. “Saka ndichatsaura Tende Rokusangana nearitari uye ndichatsaura Aroni navanakomana vake kuti vandishumire savaprista. Ipapo ndichagara pakati pavaIsraeri uye ndigova Mwari wavo. Vachaziva kuti ndini Jehovha Mwari wavo, akavabudisa kubva muIjipiti kuitira kuti ndigogara pakati pavo. Ndini Jehovha Mwari wavo.

Aritari yeZvinonhuwira “Uite aritari yokupirisa zvinonhuwira namatanda omuakasia. Inofanira kuenzana mativi ayo ose ari mana, yakareba kubhiti rimwe chetea uye kubhiti rimwe chete paupamhi, uye kukwirira kwayo makubhiti mavirib, nyanga dzayo dzive chinhu chimwe chete nayo. Ufukidze pamusoro payo namativi ose uye nenyanga dzayo negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uye uite hata mbiri kumativi akatarisana. Kuti dzibate mapango anoshandiswa kuitakura. Uite mapango aya nomuti womuakasia uye uafukidze negoridhe. Uise aritari mberi kwechidzitiro chiri pamberi peareka yeChipupuriro, pamberi pechifunhiro chokuyananisa chiri pamusoro peChipupuriro, pandichasangana newe. “Aroni anofanira kupisa zvinonhuwira pamusoro pearitari mangwanani oga oga paanogadzira mwenje. Anofanira kupisazve zvinonhuwira paanenge achitungidza mwenje madekwana saka zvinonhuwira zvinofanira kupiswa nguva dzose pamberi paJehovha kusvikira kumarudzi anotevera. Musapisira pamusoro pearitari iyi zvimwewo zvazvo zvinonhuwira kana zvipiriso zvipi zvazvo zvinopiswa kana zvipiriso zvezviyo, uye musadururire chipiriso chinonwiwa pamusoro payo. Aroni achaita yananiso panyanga idzi kamwe chete pagore. Yananiso yapagore iyi inofanira kuitwa neropa rokuyananisa rechipiriso chechivi kusvikira kumarudzi anotevera. Chitsvene-tsvene kuna Jehovha.” Mari yeYananiso Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Paunoverenga vaIsraeri kuti uvanyore, mumwe nomumwe anofanira kupa Jehovha rudzikinuro rwoupenyu hwake panguva yaanoverengwa. Ipapo hapana denda richazouya pamusoro pavo paunovaverenga. Mumwe nomumwe anoyambukira kuna avo vatoverengwa anofanira kupa hafu yeshekeric, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, rinorema magera makumi maviri. Hafu yeshekeri iyi chipiriso kuna Jehovha. Vose vanoyambuka, vaya vana makore makumi maviri kana avo vapfuura, vanofanira kupa chipiriso kuna Jehovha. Vapfumi havafaniri kupa zvinopfuura hafu yeshekeri uye varombo havafaniri kupa zvishoma pamunoita chipiriso kuna Jehovha kuti muyananiswe upenyu hwenyu. Ugamuchire mari yeyananiso kubva kuvaIsraeri ugoishandisa paushumiri hweTende Rokusangana. Chichava chirangaridzo kuvaIsraeri pamberi paJehovha, muchiyananisira upenyu hwenyu.” Mudziyo woKushambira Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Uite mudziyo wokushambira wendarira, nechigadziko chawo chendariria. Ugouisa pakati peTende Rokusangana nearitari uye ugoisa mvura mauri. Aroni navanakomana vake vanofanira kushamba maoko avo netsoka dzavo nemvura kuitira kuti varege kufa. Uyezve, pavanoswedera paaritari kuti vazoshumira nokupa chipiriso chinoitirwa Jehovha nomoto, vachashamba maoko avo netsoka dzavo kuitira kuti varege kufa. Uyu unofanira kuva mutemo usingaperi waAroni nezvizvarwa zvake kusvikira kumarudzi anotevera.” Mafuta oKuzodza Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Tora zvinonhuwira zvinotevera izvi: mazana mashanu amashekerid emura inoerera, hafu yakadaro (ndiwo mazana maviri namakumi mashanu amashekeri) ezvinonhuwira zvesinamoni, mazana maviri namakumi mashanu enzimbe, mashekeri omuakasia mazana mashanu, zvose zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, nehinie yamafuta omuorivhi. Vhenganisa izvi kuti zvive mafuta matsvene okuzodza, anonhuwira akavhenganiswa, basa romuvhenganisi wezvinonhuwira. Achava mafuta matsvene okuzodza. Ipapo ugoashandisa kuzodza Tende Rokusangana, neareka yeChipupuriro, tafura nemidziyo yayo yose, chigadziko chomwenje nenhumbi dzacho dzose, aritari yezvinonhuwira, aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa nemidziyo yayo, uye mudziyo wokushambira nechigadziko chawo. Unofanira kuzvitsaura kuti zvigova zvitsvene-tsvene, uye zvose zvichazvigunzva zvichava zvitsvene. “Uzodze Aroni navanakomana vake uye uvatsaure kuitira kuti vagondishandira savaprista. Uti kuvaIsraeri, ‘Aya achava mafuta angu matsvene okuzodza amarudzi anotevera. Musaadira pamiviri yavanhu uye musaita mafuta api zvawo nenzira imwe cheteyo. Matsvene, uye munofanira kuaita matsvene. Ani naani anoita mafuta anonhuwira akafanana nawo uye ani naani anoaisa pamunhu upi zvake kunze kwomuprista anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake.’ ” Zvinonhuwira Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Tora zvinonhuwira zvinoti sitaketi, onika negaribhanamu, uye zvinonhuwira zvakaisvonaka, zvose zvakaenzana, ugoita zvakafanira kurungwa zvigova zvakaisvonaka uye zvive zvitsvene. Ukuye zvimwe zvacho zvive upfu ugozviisa pamberi peChipupuriro chiri muTende Rokusangana, umo mandichasangana newe. Zvichava zvitsvene-tsvene kwauri. Usazviitira zvinonhuwira zvipi zvazvo nenzira imwe cheteyo; uzvicherechedze kuti zvitsvene kuna Jehovha. Ani naani achaita chipi zvacho chakafanana nacho kuti afadzwe nokunhuwira kwacho, anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake.”

Bhezareri naOhoriabhi Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Tarira ndasarudza Bhezareri mwanakomana waUri, mwanakomana waHuri, worudzi rwaJudha, uye ndamuzadza noMweya waMwari, nouchenjeri, nokugona nokuziva mhando dzose dzoumhizha, kuita unyanzvi hwebasa regoridhe, sirivha nendarira, kuveza nokuronga mabwe, kushanda pabasa rokuveza matanda, nokubata mumhando dzose dzoumhizha. Pamusoro paizvozvo ndakagadza Ohoriabhi mwanakomana waAhisamaki, worudzi rwaOhani, kuti amubatsire. Uyezve ndapa unyanzvi kumhizha kuti vaite zvinhu zvose zvandakakurayira zvinoti: Tende Rokusangana, areka yeChipupuriro ine chifukidzo pamusoro payo, nenhumbi dzose dzetende, tafura nenhumbi dzayo, chigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rakaisvonaka nenhumbi dzacho dzose, aritari yezvinonhuwira, aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa nenhumbi dzayo dzose, mudziyo wokushambira nechigadziko chawo, uyewo nguo yakarukwa, dzose nguo tsvene dzaAroni muprista uye nguo dzavanakomana vake pavanoshumira savaprista, namafuta okuzodza uye nezvinonhuwira kwazvo zveNzvimbo Tsvene. Vanofanira kudzigadzira sezvandakakurayira iwe.” Sabata Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Uti kuvaIsraeri, ‘Munofanira kucherechedza Sabata rangu. Ichi ndicho chichava chiratidzo pakati pangu nemi kumarudzi anotevera, kuti mugoziva kuti ndini Jehovha, anokuitai vatsvene. “ ‘Cherechedzai Sabata, nokuti idzvene kwamuri. Munhu upi zvake anorizvidza anofanira kuurayiwa; ani naani anobata basa ripi zvaro pazuva iroro anofanira kubviswa pakati pavanhu vokwake. Kwamazuva matanhatu, basa rinofanira kuitwa, asi zuva rechinomwe iSabata rokuzorora, idzvene kuna Jehovha. Ani naani anoita basa ripi zvaro nomusi weSabata anofanira kuurayiwa. VaIsraeri vanofanira kucherechedza Sabata, vachiripemberera kusvikira kumarudzi anotevera sesungano isingaperi. Richava chiratidzo pakati pangu navaIsraeri nokusingaperi, nokuti mukati mamazuva matanhatu Jehovha akasika denga nenyika, uye nomusi wechinomwe akarega kushanda uye akazorora.’ ” Jehovha akati apedza kutaura naMozisi paGomo reSinai, akamupa mahwendefa maviri eChipupuriro, mahwendefa amabwe akanyorwa nomunwe waMwari.

Mhuru yegoridhe Vanhu vakati vaona kuti Mozisi akanga anonoka kwazvo kuburuka kubva mugomo, vakaungana pana Aroni uye vakati, “Uya, tiitire vamwari vachatitungamirira. Kana ari munhu uyu Mozisi akatibudisa muIjipiti, hatizivi zvaitika kwaari.” Aroni akavapindura akati, “Bvisai mhete dzegoridhe dzakapfekwa navakadzi venyu, vanakomana venyu navanasikana venyu mugouya nadzo kwandiri.” Saka vanhu vose vakabvisa mhete dzavo vakauya nadzo kuna Aroni. Akatora zvavakamupa akaita nazvo chifananidzo chakaumbwa muchimiro chemhuru, achichiveza nembezo. Ipapo vakati, “Ava ndivo vamwari venyu, imi Israeri, vakakubudisai kubva muIjipiti.” Aroni akati aona izvi, akavaka aritari pamberi pemhuru iya akazivisa vanhu ati, “Mangwana kuchava nomutambo kuna Jehovha.” Saka zuva rakatevera vanhu vakamuka mangwanani vakabayira zvipiriso zvinopiswa uye vakapa zvipiriso zvokuwadzana. Shure kwaizvozvo vakagara pasi vakadya nokunwa uye vakasimuka kuti vatambe. Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Buruka, nokuti vanhu vako, vawakabudisa muIjipiti, vaora. Vakurumidza kutsauka pane zvandakavarayira uye vakazviitira chifananidzo chakavezwa muchimiro chemhuru. Vapfugamira pachiri uye vakabayira kwachiri uye vakati, ‘Ava ndivo vamwari venyu, imi vaIsraeri, vakakubudisai kubva muIjipiti.’ ” Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Ndaona vanhu ava, uye vanhu vane mitsipa mikukutu. Zvino ndirege hangu kuti kutsamwa kwangu kupfute pamusoro pavo uye kuti ndivaparadze. Ipapo iwe ndichakuita rudzi rukuru.” Asi Mozisi akatsvaka nyasha dzaJehovha Mwari wake, akati, “Haiwa Jehovha, kutsamwa kwenyu kungapfuta seiko pamusoro pavanhu venyu, vamakabudisa kubva muIjipiti nesimba guru uye noruoko rune simba? VaIjipita vachataurireiko vachiti, ‘Akavabudisa muIjipiti nomurangariro wakaipa, kuti avauraye mumakomo uye nokuvaparadza panyika.’ Dzokai henyu pakutsamwa kwenyu kunotyisa; dzokai uye murege kuuyisa njodzi pamusoro pavanhu venyu. Rangarirai varanda venyu vana Abhurahama, Isaka naIsraeri, vamakapika kwavari nemi pachenyu muchiti, ‘Ndichaita kuti zvizvarwa zvenyu zviwande senyeredzi dzokudenga, uye ndichapa zvizvarwa zvenyu nyika iyi yose yandakavavimbisa, uye ichava nhaka yavo nokusingaperi.’ ” Ipapo Jehovha akazvidemba uye akarega kuuyisa njodzi yaakanga oda kuisa pamusoro pavanhu vake. Mozisi akadzoka uye akaburuka mugomo ane mahwendefa maviri eChipupuriro mumaoko ake. Akanga akanyorwa kumativi ose ari maviri, mberi neshure. Mahwendefa aya rakanga riri basa raMwari; runyoro rwakanga rwuri runyoro rwaMwari, rwakatemwa pamahwendefa. Joshua akati anzwa mheremhere yavanhu vaidanidzira, akati kuna Mozisi, “Mune ruzha rwehondo mumusasa.” Mozisi akapindura akati, “Harusi ruzha rwokukunda, harusi ruzha rwokukundwa; ruzha rwokuimba rwandinonzwa.” Mozisi akati aswedera pamusasa uye akaona mhuru uye nokutamba, kutsamwa kwake kwakavira uye akakanda mahwendefa achibva mumaoko ake, akaaputsa kuita zvidimbu zvidimbu pajinga regomo. Uye akatora mhuru yavakanga vagadzira ndokuipisa nomoto; ipapo akaikuya kuita upfu, akahuparadzira pamusoro pemvura uye akaita kuti vaIsraeri vainwe. Akati kuna Aroni, “Ko vanhu ava vakaiteiko kwauri, zvawavatungamirira muchivi chikuru zvakadai?” Aroni akapindura akati, “Regai kutsamwa, ishe wangu. Munoziva kuti vanhu ava vanorerekera sei pakutadza. Vakati kwandiri, ‘Tiitire vamwari vachatitungamirira. Kana ari munhu uyu Mozisi akatibudisa kubva muIjipiti, hatizivi zvakaitika kwaari.’ Saka ndakati kwavari, ‘Ani naani ane zvishongo zvegoridhe, ngaabvise.’ Ipapo vakandipa goridhe, uye ndikarikanda mumoto, uye ndipo pakabuda mhuru iyi!” Mozisi akaona kuti vanhu vakanga vatopenga zvavo uye kuti Aroni akanga avarega vasisazvidzori uye kuti vakanga vava chiseko kuvavengi vavo. Saka akamira pamukova wokupinda nawo mumusasa akati, “Ani naani ari kurutivi rwaJehovha, ngaauye kwandiri.” Uye vaRevhi vose vakaenda kwaari. Ipapo akati kwavari, “Zvanzi naJehovha Mwari waIsraeri, ‘Murume mumwe nomumwe ngaapakate munondo parutivi rwake. Mufambefambe mumusasa kubva kuno rumwe rutivi kusvika kuno rumwe, mumwe nomumwe achiuraya hama yake neshamwari yake nomuvakidzani wake.’ ” VaRevhi vakaita sezvavakarayirwa naMozisi, uye nomusi uyo vanhu zviuru zvitatu vakafa. Ipapo Mozisi akati, “Imi matsaurirwa Jehovha nhasi, nokuti makanga muchirwa navanakomana venyu uye nehama dzenyu, uye akuropafadzai nhasi.” Fume mangwana Mozisi akati kuvanhu, “Maita chitadzo chikuru. Asi zvino ndichaenda kuna Jehovha; zvimwe ndingagona kukuitirai yananiso nokuda kwechivi chenyu.” Saka Mozisi akadzokera kuna Jehovha uye akati, “Haiwa vanhu ava vaita chivi chikuru sei! Vazviitira vamwari vegoridhe. Asi zvino, ndapota hangu varegererei chivi chavo, asi kana zvisina kudaro, ipapo ndidzimei henyu mubhuku ramakanyora.” Jehovha akapindura Mozisi akati, “Ani naani anenge atadzirana neni ndichamudzima mubhuku rangu. Zvino chienda, tungamirira vanhu kunzvimbo yandakataura nezvayo, uye mutumwa wangu achakutungamirirai. Kunyange zvakadaro, nguva yokuti ndirange painosvika, ndichavaranga nokuda kwechivi chavo.” Uye Jehovha akarova vanhu nedenda nokuda kwezvavakaita nemhuru yakaitwa naAroni.

Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Ibva panzvimbo ino, iwe navanhu vawakabudisa kubva muIjipiti uye ukwire kunyika yandakavimbisa nemhiko kuna Abhurahama, Isaka naJakobho ndichiti, ‘Ndichaipa kuzvizvarwa zvako.’ Ndichatuma mutumwa pamberi pako agodzinga vaKenani, vaAmori, vaHiti, vaPerezi, vaHivhi navaJebhusi. Kwirai kunyika inoyerera mukaka nouchi. Asi ini handiendi nemi, nokuti muri vanhu vane mitsipa mikukutu uye ndingazokuparadzai munzira.” Vanhu vakati vachinzwa mashoko anotambudza aya, vakatanga kuchema uye hapana munhu akashonga zvinoyevedza. Nokuti Jehovha akanga ati kuna Mozisi, “Taurira vaIsraeri uti, ‘Muri vanhu vane mitsipa mikukutu. Kana dai ndingaende nemi kunyange kwenguva duku, ndingakuparadzai. Zvino bvisai zvishongo zvenyu uye ini ndichafunga zvokuita nemi.’ ” Saka vaIsraeri vakabvisa zvishongo zvavo pagomo reHorebhu. Tende Rokusangana Zvino Mozisi aisitora tende achiridzika kunze kwomusasa kachinhambwe, achiti ndiro “Tende Rokusangana.” Munhu upi zvake ainge ane chaanoda kubvunza kuna Jehovha aienda kuTende Rokusangana kunze kwomusasa. Uye pose paibuda Mozisi achienda kutende, vanhu vose vaisimuka vachibva vomira pamikova yamatende avo, vakatarira Mozisi kusvikira apinda mutende. Kana Mozisi apinda mutende, shongwe yegore yaiburuka yobva yamira pamukova, Jehovha achitaura naMozisi. Vanhu vaiti vangoona shongwe yegore pamukova wokupinda mutende, vose vaimira uye vobva vanamata, mumwe nomumwe pamukova wetende rake. Jehovha aizotaura naMozisi uso nouso, somunhu anotaura neshamwari yake. Ipapo Mozisi aizodzokera kumusasa, asi mubatsiri wake Joshua mwanakomana waNuni akanga asingabudi mutende. Mozisi noKubwinya kwaJehovha Mozisi akati kuna Jehovha, “Imi manga muchinditaurira muchiti, ‘Tungamirira vanhu ava,’ asi hamusati mandizivisa wamuchandituma naye. Manga muchingoti, ‘Ndinokuziva nezita rako uye wawana nyasha kwandiri.’ Kana muchifadzwa neni, ndidzidzisei nzira dzenyu kuitira kuti ndigokuzivai uye ndirambe ndichiwana nyasha kwamuri. Rangarirai kuti rudzi urwu vanhu venyu.” Jehovha akapindura akati, “Kuvapo kwangu kuchaenda newe, uye ndichakupa zororo.” Ipapo Mozisi akati kwaari, “Kana Kuvapo kwenyu kusingaendi nesu, musatibvisa pano. Vanhu vachaziva sei kuti munofadzwa neni uye navanhu venyu kana musina kuenda nesu? Chiizve chicharatidza mutsauko pakati pangu navanhu venyu navamwe vanhu vose vari pamusoro penyika?” Uye Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Ndichaita chinhu ichocho chawakumbira, nokuti ndinofadzwa newe uye ndinokuziva nezita.” Ipapo Mozisi akati, “Zvino ndiratidzei kubwinya kwenyu.” Uye Jehovha akati, “Ndichaita kuti kunaka kwangu kupfuure napamberi pako, uye ndichaparidza zita rangu, iro Jehovha, pamberi pako. Ndichanzwira nyasha iye wandichanzwira nyasha, uye ndichanzwira tsitsi uyo wandichanzwira tsitsi.” Iye akati, “Asi haugoni kuona chiso changu, nokuti hapana munhu angandiona uye akararama.” Ipapo Jehovha akati, “Pane nzvimbo iri pedyo neni paungamira padombo. Panopfuura kubwinya kwangu, ndichakuisa mumukaha wedombo uye ndichakufukidza noruoko rwangu, uye uchaona shure kwangu; asi chiso changu hachifaniri kuonekwa.”

Mahwendefa matsva amabwe Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Veza matombo maviri amahwendefa akaita sokutanga, uye ndichanyora paari mashoko akanga ari pamahwendefa okutanga, awakaputsa. Ugadzirire mangwanani, uye ipapo ugouya pamusoro peGomo reSinai. Uzviise kwandiri iwe ipapo pamusoro pegomo. Hapana munhu anofanira kuuya newe kana kuonekwa papi zvapo pamusoro peGomo; kunyange makwai kana mombe zvinopfuura pamberi pegomo.” Saka Mozisi akaveza mahwendefa maviri amabwe akaita sookutanga uye akakwira pamusoro pegomo reSinai mangwananingwanani, sezvaakanga arayirwa naJehovha; uye akatakura mahwendefa maviri amabwe mumaoko ake. Ipapo Jehovha akaburuka kwaari ari mugore uye akamira naye ipapo uye akazivisa zita rake, Jehovha. Uye akapfuura napamberi paMozisi, achizivisa achiti, “Jehovha, Jehovha, Mwari ane tsitsi nenyasha, anononoka kutsamwa, azere norudo uye akatendeka, anoitira rudo kuzviuru zvamazana, uye achikanganwira zvakaipa, kumukira uye chivi. Asi haaregi ane mhosva asingarangwi; anoranga vana navana vavo nokuda kwechivi chamadzibaba avo kusvikira kurudzi rwechitatu norwechina.” Mozisi akapfugama pakarepo uye akanamata. Akati, “Haiwa Jehovha, kana ndawana nyasha pamberi penyu, ipapo Jehovha ngaaende nesu. Kunyange vanhu ava vane mitsipa mikukutu, regererai henyu kuipa kwedu nechivi chedu, uye mutitore senhaka yenyu.” Ipapo akati, “Ndava kuita sungano newe. Ndichaita zvishamiso pamberi pavanhu vako zvisina kumboitwa kare mundudzi dzipi zvadzo munyika yose. Vanhu vaunogara pakati pavo vachaona kuti basa randichakuitira ini, Jehovha rinotyisa sei. Uteerere zvandinokurayira nhasi. Ndichadzinga pamberi pako vaAmori, vaKenani, vaHiti, vaPerezi, vaHivhi navaJebhusi. Uchenjerere kuti urege kuita sungano naavo vagere munyika yamunoenda kuti varege kuva musungo pakati penyu. Putsirai aritari dzavo pasi, pwanyai matombo avo anoyera uye muteme matanda avo aAshera. Musanamata vamwe vamwari vapi zvavo, nokuti Jehovha, iye ane zita rinonzi Godo, ndiye Mwari ane godo. “Uchenjerere kuti urege kuita sungano naavo vanogara munyika; nokuti pavanenge voita ufeve hwavo kuna vamwari vavo uye vakabayira kwavari, vachakukokai uye muchadya zvibayiro zvavo. Uye pamunosarudza vamwe vanasikana vavo kuti vave vakadzi vavanakomana venyu uye vanasikana avo vakaita ufeve navamwari vavo, vachatungamirira vanakomana venyu kuita zvimwe chetezvo. “Musaita zvifananidzo zvakaumbwa. “Mupemberere Mutambo weZvingwa Zvisina Mbiriso. Mudye chingwa chisina mbiriso kwamazuva manomwe, sezvandakurayirai. Muite izvi panguva yakatarwa mumwedzi waAbhibhi, nokuti mumwedzi iwoyo makabuda muIjipiti. “Chibereko chose chinotanga kuzarura chizvaro ndechangu, kusanganisira matangwe ose makono ezvipfuwo zvako, dzingava mombe kana makwai. Udzikinure dangwe rembongoro negwayana, asi kana usingaridzikinuri, urivhune mutsipa waro. Udzikinure matangwe ose kuvanakomana venyu. “Hapana munhu anofanira kumira pamberi pangu asina chinhu. “Mubate basa mazuva matanhatu, asi nezuva rechinomwe munofanira kuzorora; kunyange munguva dzokurima nedzokukohwa munofanira kuzorora. “Mupemberere Mutambo weMavhiki nezvibereko zvokutanga zvegorosi yakohwewa, uye Mutambo woKuunganidza pakupera kwegore. Katatu pagore, varume vose vanofanira kumira pamberi paIshe Jehovha, Mwari waIsraeri. Ndichadzinga ndudzi pamberi penyu uye ndichakurisa nyika yenyu, uye hakuna munhu achachiva nyika yenyu pamunokwirako katatu gore rimwe nerimwe, kuti mumire pamberi paJehovha Mwari wenyu. “Musapa kwandiri ropa rezvibayiro pamwe chete nechinhu chipi zvacho chine mbiriso, uye musarega chimwe chezvibayiro zvoMutambo wePasika zvichisara kusvikira mangwanani. “Muuyise zvakaisvonaka zvezvibereko zvevhu renyu kuimba yaJehovha Mwari wenyu. “Musabika mbudzana mumukaka wamai vayo.” Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Nyora mashoko aya, nokuti maererano namashoko aya ndaita sungano newe uye neIsraeri.” Mozisi akanga ariko kuna Jehovha kwamazuva makumi mana nousiku makumi mana, asingadyi chingwa kana kunwa mvura. Uye akanyora pamahwendefa mashoko esungano, iyo Mirayiro Gumi. Chiso chaMozisi chinobwinya Mozisi akati aburuka muGomo reSinai aine mahwendefa maviri eChipupuriro mumaoko ake, iye akanga asingazivi kuti chiso chake chaibwinya nokuti akanga ataura naJehovha. Aroni navaIsraeri vose pavakaona Mozisi, chiso chake chakanga chichibwinya, uye vakatya kuswedera pedyo naye. Asi Mozisi akavadana; saka Aroni navatungamiriri vose vomumusha vakadzokera kwaari, uye iye akataura navo. Shure kwaizvozvo vaIsraeri vose vakaswedera pedyo naye, uye iye akavapa mirayiro yose yaakanga apiwa naJehovha muGomo reSinai. Mozisi akati apedza kutaura navo, akaisa chifukidzo pachiso chake. Asi pose paaipinda paUripo hwaJehovha kuti ataure naye, aibvisa chifukidzo kusvikira abuda kunze. Uye aiti paaibuda uye achiudza vaIsraeri zvaainge arayirwa, ivo vaiona kuti chiso chake chakanga chichibwinya. Ipapo Mozisi aizoisazve chifukidzo pachiso chake kusvikira apinda kundotaura naJehovha.

Mirayiro yeSabata Mozisi akaunganidza ungano yose yavaIsraeri akati kwavari, “Izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvamakarayirwa naJehovha kuti muite: Mubate basa, mazuva matanhatu, asi zuva rechinomwe richava zuva dzvene kwamuri, Sabata rokuzorora kuna Jehovha. Ani naani anoita basa ripi zvaro pazuva iro anofanira kuurayiwa. Musabatidze moto panzvimbo ipi zvayo yamugere pazuva reSabata.” Zvinhu zvomuTabhenakeri Mozisi akati kuungano yose yavaIsraeri, “Izvi ndizvo zvakarayirwa naJehovha: Kubva pane zvamunazvo, mutore chipiriso chaJehovha. Ani naani anoda ngaauyise kuna Jehovha chipiriso chegoridhe, sirivha uye nendarira; wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka; mvere dzembudzi; matehwe amakondohwe akapendwa zvitsvuku namatehwe emombe dzomugungwa; matanda omuakasia; mafuta omuorivhi emwenje; zvinonhuwira zvamafuta okuzodza uye namafuta anonhuwira kwazvo; mabwe eonikisi namamwe mabwe anokosha okuisa paefodhi nechidzitiro chechipfuva. “Vose vane unyanzvi pakati penyu ngavauye vazogadzira zvinhu zvose zvakarayirwa naJehovha: tabhenakeri netende rayo uye nechifukidzo chayo, zvikorekedzo, mapuranga, mbariro, mapango nezvigadziko; areka namapango ayo uye chifunhiro chokuyananisa uye chidzitiro chinodzivirira; tafura namapango ayo uye midziyo yayo yose uye nechingwa choKuvapo; chigadziko chomwenje nenhumbi dzacho, mwenje namafuta omwenje; aritari yezvinonhuwira namapango ayo, mafuta okuzodza uye nezvinonhuwira kwazvo; chidzitiro chapamukova wokupinda kutabhenakeri; aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa pamwe chete nechiparo chacho chendarira, mapango ayo nemidziyo yayo yose; mudziyo wokushambira wendarira nechigadziko chawo; zvidzitiro zvaparuvazhe namatanda azvo nezvigadziko, uye chidzitiro chomukova wokupinda paruvazhe; hoko dzetende retabhenakeri uye dzeparuvazhe, netambo dzacho; nguo dzakarukwa dzinopfekwa pakushumira munzvimbo tsvene, zvose nguo tsvene yaAroni muprista nenguo dzavanakomana vake pavanoshumira savaprista.” Ipapo ungano yose yavaIsraeri yakabva pamberi paMozisi, uye munhu wose aida uye akasundwa nomwoyo wake akauya nechipiriso kuna Jehovha chebasa rapaTende Rokusangana, noushumiri hwayo hwose, nezvenguo tsvene. Vose vakanga vachida zvose varume navakadzi, vakauya nezvishongo zvegoridhe zvemhando dzose zvaiti: zvikorekedzo, mhete dzenzeve, mhete uye nezvishongo zvoukomba. Vose vakapa goridhe ravo sechipiriso chokuninira kuna Jehovha. Munhu wose akanga aine wuru yebhuruu, pepuru kana tsvuku kana mucheka wakaisvonaka, kana mvere dzembudzi, matehwe amakondohwe akapendwa zvitsvuku kana matehwe emombe dzomugungwa, vakauya nazvo. Vaya vaipa chipiriso chesirivha kana ndarira vakauya nazvo sechipiriso kuna Jehovha, uye vose vaiva namatanda omuakasia echikamu chipi zvacho chebasa vakauya nawo. Mukadzi wose aigona kuruka akaruka namaoko ake uye akauyisa zvaakanga aruka, wuru yebhuruu, pepuru kana tsvuku kana mucheka wakaisvonaka. Uye vakadzi vose vaida zvavo uye vaiva nounyanzvi hwokuruka, vakaruka mvere dzembudzi. Vatungamiriri vakauya namabwe eonikisi namamwewo mabwe kuti azoiswa paefodhi napachidzitiro chechipfuva. Vakauyawo nezvinonhuwira namafuta omuorivhi emwenje uye namafuta okuzodza namafuta anonhuwira kwazvo. VaIsraeri vose, varume navakadzi vakanga vachida havo, vakavigira Jehovha zvipiriso zvokungopa zvebasa rose rakanga rarayirwa Mozisi naJehovha kuti vaite. Bhezareri naOhoriabhu Ipapo Mozisi akati kuvaIsraeri, “Tarirai, Jehovha asarudza Bhezareri mwanakomana waUri, mwanakomana waHuri, worudzi rwaJudha, uye amuzadza noMweya waMwari, nenjere, nokugona uye noruzivo rwemhando dzose dzoumhizha, kuti aite zvinhu zvinoyevedza zvebasa regoridhe, sirivha nendarira, kuveza nokuronga mabwe, kushanda mukuveza matanda uye nokuita mhando dzose dzoumhizha. Uye apa vose vari vaviri iye naOhoriabhu mwanakomana waAhisamaki, worudzi rwaOhani kugona kudzidzisa vamwe. Avazadza nenjere dzokuita mhando dzose dzebasa semhizha, vasoni, navasuki vewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka, vose zvavo imhizha huru navasoni.

“Saka Bhezareri, Ohoriabhu uye nomunhu wose wounyanzvi apiwa unyanzvi naJehovha uye kugona kuziva maitirwo ebasa rokuvaka imba tsvene ngavaite basa sezvakarayirwa naJehovha.” Ipapo Mozisi akadana Bhezareri naOhoriabhu uye munhu wose wounyanzvi uyo akapiwa kugona naJehovha uye akanga achida hake kuuya kuzoshanda basa. Vakagamuchira kubva kuna Mozisi zvipo zvose zvakanga zvauya navaIsraeri kuti zvishandiswe pabasa rokuvaka imba tsvene. Uye vanhu vakaramba vachiuyisa zvipo zvokungopa mangwanani oga oga. Saka varume vose voumhizha vakanga vachiita basa rose rapaimba tsvene vakasiya basa ravo uye vakati kuna Mozisi, “Vanhu vari kuuya nezvakawandisa zvokuitisa basa rakarayirwa naJehovha kuti riitwe.” Ipapo Mozisi akarayira uye vakatuma shoko iri pakati pomusasa wose vachiti, “Ngakurege kuva nomurume kana mukadzi achaitazve chimwe chinhu sechipo chenzvimbo tsvene.” Nokudaro vanhu vakadziviswa kuuyisa zvimwe, nokuti zvavakanga vatova nazvo zvakanga zvatowandisa pane zvaidiwa kuita basa rose. Tabhenakeri Varume vose vounyanzvi vakaita tabhenakeri nezvidzitiro gumi zvemicheka yakarukwa zvakaisvonaka newuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, namakerubhi akasonerwa mazviri nemhizha ino unyanzvi. Zvidzitiro zvose zvakanga zvakaenzana, zvakareba makubhiti makumi maviri namaserea uye makubhiti manab paupamhi. Vakabatanidza zvimwe zvidzitiro zvishanu pamwe chete uye vakaita zvimwe chetezvo pane zvimwe zvishanu. Ipapo vakaita zvishwe zvomucheka webhuruu zvichitevedza mupendero wechidzitiro chokumucheto pane zvimwe zvakabatanidzwa. Vakaitawo zvishwe makumi mashanu pachidzitiro chimwe chete uye zvishwe makumi mashanu pachidzitiro chokupedzisira chezvimwe zvakabatanidzwa nezvishwe zvakanga zvakatarisana. Ipapo vakaita zvikorekedzo zvegoridhe makumi mashanu ndokuzvishandisa kusonanidza zvibatanidzwa zviviri zvezvidzitiro pamwe chete kuitira kuti tabhenakeri ive chinhu chimwe chete. Vakaita zvidzitiro zvemvere dzembudzi zvetende rapamusoro petabhenakeri, gumi nechimwe pamwe chete. Zvidzitiro zvose zviri gumi nechimwe zvakanga zvakaenzana, makubhiti makumi matatuc pakureba uye makubhiti manad paupamhi. Vakabatanidza zvidzitiro zvishanu pamwe chete kuti zvive mubatanidzwa mumwe chete, uye zvimwe zvitanhatu kuti zvive pamwe chete. Ipapo vakaita zvishwe makumi mashanu zvaitevedza mupendero wechidzitiro chokupedzisira muchibatanidzwa chimwe chete uyewo zvichitevedza mupendero wechidzitiro chokupedzisira muno mumwe mubatanidzwa. Vakaita zvikorekedzo zvendarira makumi mashanu kuti zvisunganidze tende pamwe chete zvive sechinhu chimwe chete. Ipapo vakagadzirira tende chifukidzo chamatehwe amakondohwe akapendwa zvitsvuku, uye pamusoro pacho chifunhiro chamatehwe emombe dzomugungwa. Vakaita mapuranga akamiswa amatanda omuakasia etabhenakeri. Puranga rimwe nerimwe rakanga rakareba makubhiti gumie uye kubhiti rimwe nehafuf paupamhi, nembambo mbiri dzakamiswa dzakatarisana. Vakaita mapuranga ose etabhenakeri nenzira iyi. Vakaita mapuranga makumi maviri kurutivi rwezasi kwetabhenakeri uye vakaita makumi mana ezvigadziko zvesirivha kuti zviende pasi pazvo, zvigadziko zviviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe, chimwe chete pasi pembambo imwe neimwe. Kuno rumwe rutivi, rutivi rwokumusoro kwetabhenakeri, vakaita mapuranga makumi maviri uye makumi mana ezvigadziko zvesirivha, zviviri zviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. Vakaita mapuranga matanhatu okumucheto cheto, iko kumavirira kwetabhenakeri, uye mapuranga maviri akanga akagadzirirwa makona etabhanakeri nechokumucheto cheto. Pamakona maviri aya mapuranga aiva maviri kubva pasi kusvikira kumusoro uye akaiswa mumhete imwe chete; ose akanga akagadzirwa zvakafanana. Saka pakanga pana mapuranga masere uye zvigadziko gumi nezvitanhatu zvesirivha, zviviri zviri pasi pepuranga rimwe nerimwe. Vakaitawo mbariro dzomuti womuakasia: shanu dzamapuranga aiva pano rumwe rutivi rwetabhenakeri, shanu dzaaya aiva kuno rumwe rutivi, uye shanu dzamapuranga aiva kumavirira, pamucheto cheto kwetabhenakeri. Vakaita mbariro yapakati kuitira kuti ichinjike kubva kumucheto kusvikira kumucheto pakati pamapuranga. Vakafukidza mapuranga negoridhe uye vakaita mhete dzegoridhe kuti dzibate mbariro. Vakafukidzawo mbariro negoridhe. Vakaita zvidzitiro zvewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa, namakerubhu akasonerwa pauri nemhizha ino unyanzvi. Vakaita matanda mana omuti womuakasia vakaafukidza negoridhe. Vakaaitira zvikorekedzo uye vakaumba zvigadziko zvawo zvina zvesirivha. Vakaita chidzitiro chomukova wokupinda mutende chewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku uye mucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa, basa romuruki; uye vakaita matanda mashanu nezvikorekedzo zvawo. Vakafukidza misoro yamatanda nehata dzawo negoridhe uye vakaita zvigadziko zvawo zvishanu zvendarira.

Areka Bhezareri akaita areka yamatanda omuakasia, yakareba makubhiti maviri nehafua, kubhiti rimwe nehafub paupamhi, uye kubhiti rimwe chete nehafu pakukwirira. Akaifukidza negoridhe rakaisvonaka, zvose mukati nokunze, uye akaita hata yegoridhe yakaipoteredza. Akaiumbira mhete dzegoridhe ina akadziisa pamakumbo ayo mana, nemhete mbiri pano rumwe rutivi uye dzimwe mbiri kuno rumwezve rutivi. Ipapo akaita mapango omuti womuakasia uye akaafukidza negoridhe. Uye akapinza mapango mukati memhete parutivi rweareka okuitakura nawo. Akagadzira chifunhiro chokuyananisa chegoridhe rakaisvonaka, makubhiti maviri nehafuc pakureba uye kubhiti rimwe chete nehafud paupamhi. Ipapo akaita makerubhi maviri negoridhe rakapambadzirwa kumacheto echifunhiro. Akaita kerubhi rimwe chete kurutivi rumwe chete rwokumucheto uye kerubhi rechipiri kuno rumwezve rutivi, mativi okumucheto ari maviri akaaita chinhu chimwe chete nechifunhiro. Mapapiro amakerubhi akanga akabatanidzirwa kumusoro, achifukidza chifunhiro nomumvuri wawo. Makerubhi akanga akatarisana, akatarisa kuchifunhiro. Tafura Vakagadzira tafura namatanda omuakasia, yakareba makubhiti mavirie, uye kubhiti rimwe chetef paupamhi, uye kubhiti rimwe chete nehafug pakukwirira. Ipapo vakaifukidza negoridhe rakaisvonaka uye vakagadzira hata yegoridhe yakaipoteredza. Vakaiitirawo mukombero wakaipoteredza une upamhi hwakaita sechanza choruokoh ndokuisa hata yegoridhe pamukombero. Vakaumba mhete ina dzegoridhe dzetafura uye vakadzisungirira pamakona mana, paya pakanga pana makumbo. Mhete dzakaiswa pedyo nomukombero kuti dzibate mapango aishandiswa pakutakura tafura. Mapango okutakura tafura akagadzirwa namatanda omuakasia uye akanga akafukidzwa negoridhe. Uye vakaita nhumbi dzetafura negoridhe rakaisvonaka, ndiro dzayo, madhishi nemikombe uye nezvirongo zvayo zvokudururira zvipiriso zvinonwiwa. Chigadziko choMwenje Vakagadzira chigadziko chomwenje chegoridhe rakaisvonaka uye vakaipambadzira, chigadziko nehunde; mikombe inenge maruva, mabukira namaruva zvaiva chinhu chimwe chete nacho. Mapazi matanhatu akaiswa kubva kumativi echigadziko chomwenje, matatu kurutivi rumwe chete uye mamwe matatu kuno rumwe rutivi. Mikombe mitatu yakanga yakaumbwa seruva remuarimondi namabukira namaruva makuru zvakange zviri pane rimwe davi, matatu padavi raitevera uye zvaita saizvozvo pamatavi ose ari matanhatu aibva pachigadziko chomwenje. Uye pamusoro pechigadziko chomwenje paiva nemikombe mina yakaumbwa seruva romuarimondi namabukira uye namaruva makuru. Bukira rimwe chete rakanga riri pasi pamatavi maviri okutanga aibva pachigadziko chomwenje, bukira rechipiri rakanga riri pasi pamatavi maviri aitevera, uye bukira rechitatu rakanga riri pasi pamatavi mamwezve maviri, ose ari matanhatu pamwe chete. Mabukira namatavi zvaiva chinhu chimwe chete nechigadziko chomwenje, chegoridhe rakaisvonaka rakapambadzirwa. Vakaita mwenje yacho minomwe, pamwe chete nembato dzacho uye nendiro dzacho, dzegoridhe rakaisvonaka. Vakaita chigadziko chomwenje nenhumbi dzacho dzose kubva patarenda rimwe chetei regoridhe rakaisvonaka. Aritari yeZvinonhuwira Vakaita aritari yezvinonhuwira namatanda omuakasia. Yakanga yakaenzana mativi ose ari mana, yakareba kubhiti rimwe chetej uye kubhiti rimwe chete paupamhi, uye makubhiti mavirik pakukwirira kwayo, nyanga dzayo dziri chinhu chimwe chete nayo. Vakafukidza pamusoro payo nokumativi ose uye nenyanga, negoridhe rakaisvonaka, uye vakagadzira hata yakaipoteredza. Vakaita mhete dzegoridhe mbiri pasi pehata, mbiri kuno rumwe rutivi, kuti dzibate mapango aishandiswa pakuitakura. Vakagadzira mapango omuti womuakasia uye vakafukidza negoridhe. Vakagadzirawo mafuta matsvene okuzodza uye nezvinonhuwira kwazvo zvakaisvonaka, basa romuvhenganisi wezvinonhuwira.

Aritari yeZvipiriso Zvinopiswa Vakavaka aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa yamatanda omuakasia, yakakwirira makubhiti matatua; yakanga yakaenzana mativi ayo mana ina makubhiti mashanub pakureba uye namakubhiti mashanu paupamhi hwayo. Vakagadzira runyanga pamakona mana ose zvokuti nyanga nearitari zvakanga zvava chinhu chimwe chete, uye vakafukidza aritari nendarira. Vakaita midziyo yayo yose nendarira, hari dzayo, foshoro dzayo, midziyo yokusasa zvibayiso zvenyama uye namakango apamoto. Vakaitira aritari chiparo, mumbure wendarira, kuti chive pasi pechitsiko chayo, pakati napakati pokukwirira kwearitari. Vakaumba mhete dzendarira kuti dzibate mapango amakona mana echiparo chendarira. Vakaita mapango omuti womuakasia vakaafukidza nendarira. Vakapinza mapango mukati memhete kuitira kuti agova pamativi earitari, kuti vaitakure nawo. Vakaita namapuranga, isina chinhu mukati. Mudziyo woKushambira Vakagadzira mudziyo wokushambira wendarira uye nezvigadziko zvawo zvendarira kubva pazvionioni zvamadzimai aishumira pamukova wokupinda muTende Rokusangana. Ruvazhe Pashure vakaita ruvazhe. Rutivi rwezasi rwakanga rwakareba makubhiti zanac uye rwaiva nezvidzitiro zvomucheka wakaisvonaka uye wakarukwa, namatanda makumi maviri uye nezvigadziko zvendarira makumi maviri, nezvikorekedzo zvesirivha uye nezvisungo pamusoro pamatanda. Rutivi rwokumusorowo rwakanga runa makubhiti zana pakureba uye rwakanga rune matanda makumi maviri nezvigadziko zvendarira, ine zvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamusoro pamatanda. Mucheto wokumavirira wakanga una makubhiti makumi mashanud paupamhi, uye kwaiva nezvidzitiro, namatanda gumi uye nezvigadziko gumi, nezvikorekedzo zvesirivha nezvisungo pamusoro pamatanda. Kumucheto wokumabvazuva, wakananga kunobuda nezuva, kwaivawo noupamhi hwamakubhiti makumi mashanu. Zvidzitiro zvakareba makubhiti gumi namashanue zvaiva kurutivi rumwe chete rwomukova, namatanda matatu ezvigadziko zvitatu, uye zvidzitiro zvakareba makubhiti gumi namashanu zvaiva kuno rumwe rutivi rwokupinda muruvazhe, namatanda matatu uye nezvigadziko zvitatu. Zvidzitiro zvose zvaipoteredza ruvazhe zvaiva zvomucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka. Zvigadziko zvamatanda zvakanga zviri zvendarira. Zvikorekedzo nezvisungo zvaiva pamatanda zvaiva zvesirivha, uye misoro yawo yakanga yakafukidzwa nesirivha; saka matanda ose oruvazhe akanga ane zvisungo zvesirivha. Chidzitiro chomukova wokupinda muruvazhe chaiva chewuru yebhuruu, nepepuru netsvuku uye nomucheka wakarukwa zvakaisvonaka, basa romuruki. Chakanga chakareba makubhiti makumi mavirif, chakaita sechidzitiro chaparuvazhe, makubhiti mashanug kukwirira kwacho, namatanda mana uye nezvigadziko zvendarira zvina. Zvikorekedzo zvazvo nezvisungo zvazvo zvaiva zvesirivha, uye misoro yacho yakanga yakafukidzwa nesirivha. Mbambo dzose dzetende retabhenakeri nezvaipoteredza ruvazhe zvaiva zvendarira. Zvinhu zvakashandiswa Uku ndiko kuwanda kwezvinhu zvakashandiswa patabhenakeri, iyo tabhenakeri yeChipupuriro, zvakanyorwa pakurayira kwaMozisi navaRevhi vari pasi paItamari mwanakomana waAroni, muprista. Bhezareri mwanakomana waUri, mwanakomana waHuri, worudzi rwaJudha, akagadzira zvose zvakarayirwa Mozisi naJehovha; aiva naDhoriabhu mwanakomana waAhisamaki, worudzi rwaDhani, mhizha nomusoni, uye musoni wewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku nomucheka wakaisvonaka. Kuwanda kwegoridhe rose rakabva kuzvipiriso zvokuninira rakashandiswa pabasa rose rapaimba tsvene kwaiva matarenda makumi maviri namapfumbamwe namashekeri mazana manomwe ana makumi matatuh, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene. Sirivha yakawanikwa yakabva kuna avo veungano vakaverengwa pakunyorwa, yaiva matarenda zana, uye chiuru chimwe namazana manomwe namakumi manomwe namashanu amashekerii, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, bheka rimwe chete pamunhu, ndiyo hafu yeshekerij, zvichienderana neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, kubva kumunhu wose akanga ayambukira kuna avo vakanga vatoverengwa, vana makore makumi maviri kana kupfuura, varume vakanga vari zviuru mazana matanhatu navatatu namazana mashanu ana makumi mashanu. Matarenda zanak esirivha akashandiswa kugadzira zvigadziko zvenzvimbo tsvene pachidzitiro, zvigadziko zana zvaibva pamatarenda zana, tarenda rimwe chete pachigadziko chimwe nechimwe. Vakashandisa mashekeri chiuru chimwe chete namazana manomwe namakumi manomwe namashanul kuti vagadzire zvikorekedzo zvamatanda, kufukidza misoro yamatanda, uye vagadzire zvisungo zvawo. Ndarira yakabva kuzvipiriso zvokuninira yaiva matarenda makumi manomwe namashekeri zviuru zviviri namazana manam. Vakaishandisa kugadzira nheyo dzomukova weTende Rokusangana, aritari yendarira, chiparo chayo chendarira nemidziyo yayo yose, nheyo dzepakapoteredza ruvazhe nedzomukova warwo nembambo dzose dzetende retabhenakeri uye nezvose zvakapoteredza ruvazhe.

Nguo dzoUprista Kubva pawuru yebhuruu nepepuru netsvuku, vakaita nguo dzakarukwa dzoushumiri munzvimbo tsvene. Vakaitawo nguo tsvene dzaAroni, sokurayira kwakaita Jehovha kuna Mozisi. Efodhi Vakaita efodhi yegoridhe, uye wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye nomucheka wakaisvonaka wakarukwa. Vakapambadzira goridhe rikava marata matete uye vakagura tuwaya kuti tupfekerwe muwuru yebhuruu, yepepuru netsvuku uye mumucheka wakaisvonaka, basa remhizha ino unyanzvi. Vakaita zvipenga zvapapfudzi zveefodhi, zvaibatanidzwa pana mamwe makona ayo maviri, kuti isimbiswe. Bhande rayo romuchiuno rakarukwa nounyanzvi rakanga rakafanana nayo, zvaive chinhu chimwe neefodhi uye zvakagadzirwa negoridhe, newuru yebhuruu, nepepuru netsvuku nomucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka, sokurayirwa kwakaitwa Mozisi naJehovha. Vakagadzira matombo eonikisi vakaanyudza mukati mamaruva egoridhe uye vakanyora norunyoro rwokutema padombo sezvinoitwa padombo rechisimbiso ramazita avanakomana vaIsraeri. Ipapo vakaisa pamapenga apamapfudzi eefodhi matombo echirangaridzo chavana vaIsraeri sokurayira kwaJehovha kuna Mozisi. Chidzitiro cheChipfuva Vakaita chidzitiro chechipfuva, basa remhizha ino unyanzvi. Vakachiita seefodhi: negoridhe, uye wuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, uye nomucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka. Chakanga chakaenzana mativi acho ose ari mana, chakaenzana nechanzaa paurefu uye chakaenzana nechanza paupamhi uye chakapetwa kaviri. Ipapo vakagadzira mitsara mina yamatombo anokosha pamusoro pacho. Mumutsara wokutanga makanga mune ibwe rerubhi, topazi nebheriri; mumutsara wechipiri maiva netekoisi, nesafire uye nemaradhi; mumutsara wechitatu maiva nejasindi, neagati uye neametisi; mumutsara wechina maiva nekirisoriti, neonikisi uye nejasipa. Akanga akagadzirwa mukati mamaruva egoridhe. Paiva namatombo gumi namaviri, rimwe richimirira rimwe ramazita avanakomana vaIsraeri, rimwe nerimwe rakanyorwa, sorunyoro rwakatemwa padombo sechisimbiso chine rimwe ramazita amarudzi gumi namaviri. Chidzitiro chechipfuwa vakachiitirawo uketani hwakarukwa negoridhe rakaisvonaka, rwakaita setambo. Vakaita maruva maviri egoridhe nemhete mbiri dzegoridhe, uye vakasungirira mhete idzi pana mamwe amakona maviri echidzitiro chechipfuva. Vakasungirira humwe uketani huviri hwegoridhe pamhete dzapamakona echidzitiro chechipfuva, uye mimwe miromo youketani pamaruva maviri, zvichibatanidzwa pazvipenga zvapamapfudzi eefodhi nechemberi. Vakagadzira mhete dzegoridhe mbiri vakadzibatanidza namamwe makona maviri echidzitiro chechipfuva pamupendero nechomukati pedyo neefodhi. Ipapo vakagadzira dzimwezve mhete mbiri dzegoridhe uye vakadzibatanidza nechepasi pezvipenga zvamapfudzi pamberi peefodhi, pedyo nemusono uri nechapamusoro pebhanire romuchiuno refodhi. Vakasungirira mhete dzapachidzitiro chapachipfuva pamhete dzapaefodhi netambo yebhuruu, ichiibatanidza nebhanire romuchiuno kuitira kuti chidzitiro chechipfuva chirege kubva paefodhi, sokurayira kwaJehovha kuna Mozisi. Dzimwe Nguo dzoUprista Vakaita jasi reefodhi nomucheka webhuruu yoga, basa romuruki, rakazaruka pakati pejasi sokuzaruka kwekora, uye mupendero wakapoteredza buri iri, kuitira kuti rirege kubvaruka. Vakaita matamba ewuru yebhuruu, nepepuru netsvuku nomucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka wakapoteredza mupendero wejasi. Uye vakaita matare egoridhe rakaisvonaka uye vakaabatanidza achipoteredza mupendero pakati pamatamba. Matare namatamba akanga achipesana akapoteredza mupendero wejasi rinofanira kupfekwa pakushumira, sokurayira kwaJehovha kuna Mozisi. Vakaitira Aroni navanakomana vake, majasi omucheka wakaisvonaka, basa romuruki, uye nguwani yomucheka wakaisvonaka, bhanire romucheka romumusoro uye nenguo dzapasi dzomucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka. Ndaza yacho yakanga iri yomucheka wakarukwa wakaisvonaka wewuru yebhuruu, pepuru netsvuku, basa romuruki, sokurayira kwaJehovha kuna Mozisi. Vakagadzira ndiro, korona tsvene, yegoridhe rakaisvonaka uye yakanyorwa pairi, sorunyoro rwapachisimbiso, kuti: MUTSVENE KUNA JEHOVHA. Ipapo vakasungirira tambo yebhuruu pairi kuti ibatanidzwe nenguwani, sokurayira kwaJehovha kuna Mozisi. Mozisi anotarira Tabhenakeri Saka basa rose patabhenakeri, Tende Rokusangana, rakapera. VaIsraeri vakaita zvinhu zvose sezvakanga zvarayirwa naJehovha kuna Mozisi. Ipapo vakauya netabhenakeri kuna Mozisi: tende nenhumbi dzaro dzose, zvikorekedzo zvayo, mapuranga, mbariro, matanda nezvigadziko; chifukidzo chamatehwe amakondohwe akapendwa zvitsvuku, chifukidzo chamatehwe emombe dzomugungwa nezvidzitiro zvokudzivirira; areka yeChipupuriro namapango ayo nechifunhiro chokuyananisa; tafura nenhumbi dzayo dzose nechingwa choKuvapo; zvigadziko zvomwenje zvegoridhe rakaisvonaka nemitsara yacho yemwenje, nhumbi dzayo dzose, namafuta omwenje; aritari yegoridhe, mafuta okuzodza, zvinonhuwira kwazvo nechidzitiro chapamukova wetende; aritari yendarira, chiparo chayo chendarira, mapango ayo nemidziyo yayo yose; dhishi nechigadziko charo; zvidzitiro zvoruvazhe namatanda nezvigadziko zvarwo, uye chidzitiro chapamukova woruvazhe; tambo nembambo dzetende dzaparuvazhe; midziyo yose yetabhenakeri, Tende Rokusangana; uye jasi rakarukwa rinopfekwa pakushumira munzvimbo tsvene, zvose nguo tsvene dzaAroni muprista nenguo dzavanakomana vake pavanoshumira savaprista. VaIsraeri vakanga vaita basa rose sokurayira kwaJehovha kuna Mozisi. Mozisi akaongorora basa uye akaona kuti vakanga variita sokurayira kwakange kwaita Jehovha. Saka Mozisi akavaropafadza.

Kudzika Tabhenakeri Ipapo Jehovha akati kuna Mozisi, “Dzika tabhenakeri, Tende Rokusangana, pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wokutanga. Uise areka yeChipupuriro mairi uye ugofukidza areka nechidzitiro. Upinze tafura ugoisa zvinhu zvayo pairi. Ipapo ugopinza chigadziko chomwenje ugomisa mwenje yacho. Uise aritari yezvinonhuwira yegoridhe pamberi peareka yechipupuriro uye ugoisa chidzitiro pamukova wokupinda mutabhenakeri. “Uise aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa pamberi pomukova wokupinda kutabhenakeri, Tende Rokusangana; uise dhishi pakati peTende Rokusangana nearitari ugoisa mvura mariri. Ugadzire ruvazhe rwakaipoteredza uye ugoisa chidzitiro pamukova woruvazhe. “Utore mafuta okuzodza ugozodza tabhenakeri nezvinhu zvose zvirimo; uinatse nenhumbi dzayo dzose, uye ichava tsvene. Ipapo ugozodza aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa nenhumbi dzayo dzose; unatse aritari, uye ichava tsvene-tsvene. Uzodze dhishi nechigadziko charo ugozvinatsa. “Uuye naAroni navanakomana vake kumukova weTende Rokusangana ugovashambidza nemvura. Ipapo ugopfekedza Aroni nguo tsvene, umuzodze uye ugomunatsa kuti agondishumira somuprista. Uuyise vanakomana vake ugovapfekedza majasi. Uvazodze sokuzodza kwawaita baba vavo, kuti vagondishumira savaprista. Kuzodzwa kwavo kuchava kwouprista hucharamba huripo kumarudzi anotevera.” Mozisi akaita zvose sezvaakarayirwa naJehovha. Saka tabhenakeri yakamiswa pazuva rokutanga romwedzi wokutanga mugore rechipiri. Mozisi akati amisa tabhenakeri, akaisa zvigadziko panzvimbo yazvo, akadzika mapuranga, akapinza mbariro uye akamisa matanda. Ipapo akatambanudza tende akariisa pamusoro petabhenakeri ndokuisa chifukidzo pamusoro petende, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa naJehovha. Akatora Chipupuriro akachiisa muareka, akabatanidza mapango paareka uye akaisa chifunhiro chokuyananisa pamusoro payo. Ipapo akauyisa areka mutabhenakeri ndokuturika chidzitiro chokufukidzira akafukidza areka yeChipupuriro, sokurayira kwakaita Jehovha. Mozisi akaisa tafura muTende Rokusangana nechokurutivi rwokumusoro kwetabhenakeri kunze kwechidzitiro uye akaisa chingwa pamusoro payo pamberi paJehovha, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa naJehovha. Akaisa chigadziko chomwenje muTende Rokusangana chakatarisana netafura nechokurutivi rwezasi rwetabhenakeri uye akamisa mwenje pamberi paJehovha, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa naJehovha. Mozisi akaisa aritari yegoridhe muTende Rokusangana pamberi pechidzitiro, uye akapisa zvinonhuwira pairi, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa naJehovha. Ipapo akaisa chidzitiro pamukova wetabhenakeri. Akamisa aritari yezvipiriso zvinopiswa pedyo nomukova wetabhenakeri, Tende Rokusangana, akapa pairi zvipiriso zvinopiswa nezvipiriso zvezviyo, sokurayirwa kwaakaitwa naJehovha. Akaisa dhishi pakati peTende Rokusangana nearitari uye akaisa mvura yokushamba mariri, uye Mozisi naAroni navanakomana vake vakaishandisa kushamba maoko avo netsoka dzavo. Vaishamba pose pavaipinda muTende Rokusangana kana kuswedera paaritari, sokurayirwa kwakaitwa Mozisi naJehovha. Ipapo Mozisi akaita ruvazhe rwakapoteredza tabhenakeri nearitari uye akaturika chidzitiro pamukova wokupinda muruvazhe. Nokudaro Mozisi akapedza basa. Kubwinya kwaJehovha Ipapo gore rakafukidza Tende Rokusangana, uye kubwinya kwaJehovha kwakazadza tabhenakeri. Mozisi haana kugona kupinda muTende Rokusangana nokuti gore rakanga ragara pariri, uye kubwinya kwaJehovha kwakazadza tabhenakeri. Mukufamba kwose kwavaIsraeri, pose paisimuka gore kubva pamusoro petabhenakeri, ivo vaisimuka vachienda; asi kana gore risina kubva, vakanga vasingafambi, kusvikira pazuva rarinosimuka. Saka gore raJehovha raiva pamusoro petabhenakeri masikati; uye moto wakanga uri mugore usiku, pamberi peimba yose yaIsraeri panguva yokufamba kwavo kwose.
